verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <WH8141> year שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <WH7970> and thirtieth וָשֵׁשׁ֙ <WH8337> In the six לְמַלְכ֣וּת <WH4438> of the reign אָסָ֔א <WH609> of Asa עָלָ֞ה <WH5927> came up בַּעְשָׁ֤א <WH1201> Baasha מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> against Judah וַיִּ֖בֶן <WH1129> and built אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָמָ֑ה <WH7414> Ramah לְבִלְתִּ֗י <WH1115> to the intent that תֵּ֚ת <WH5414> he might let יוֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> none go out וָבָ֔א <WH935> or come in לְאָסָ֖א <WH609> to Asa מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וַיֹּצֵ֨א <WH3318> brought out אָסָ֜א <WH609> Then Asa כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> silver וְזָהָ֗ב <WH2091> and gold מֵאֹֽצְר֛וֹת <WH214> out of the treasures בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> and of the king's וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> and sent אֶל־ <WH413> about בֶּן־ הֲדַד֙ <WH1130> to Benhadad מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of Syria הַיּוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> that dwelt בְּדַרְמֶ֖שֶׂק <WH1834> at Damascus לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

בְּרִית֙ <WH1285> [There is] a league בֵּינִ֣י <WH996> between וּבֵינֶ֔ךָ <WH996> and me between וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> and me between אָבִ֖י <WH1> between me and thee as [there was] between my father וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> and me between אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> and thy father הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold שָׁלַ֤חְתִּֽי <WH7971> behold I have sent לְךָ֙ כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> thee silver וְזָהָ֔ב <WH2091> and gold לֵ֞ךְ <WH1980> go הָפֵ֣ר <WH6565> break בְּרִֽיתְךָ֗ <WH1285> thy league אֶת־ <WH854> with בַּעְשָׁא֙ <WH1201> with Baasha מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְיַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> that he may depart מֵעָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> and

וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <WH8085> hearkened בֶּן הֲדַ֜ד <WH1130> And Benhadad אֶל־ <WH413> against הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> unto king אָסָ֗א <WH609> Asa וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <WH7971> and sent אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> the captains הַחֲיָלִ֤ים <WH2428> of his armies אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לוֹ֙ אֶל־ <WH413> against עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> against the cities יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיַּכּוּ֙ <WH5221> and they smote אֶת־ <WH853> עִיּ֣וֹן <WH5859> Ijon וְאֶת־ <WH853> דָּ֔ן <WH1835> and Dan וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> אָבֵ֣ל מָ֑יִם <WH66> and Abelmaim וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּֽל־ <WH3605> and all מִסְכְּנ֖וֹת <WH4543> and all the store עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> cities נַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <WH5321> of Naphtali

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> heard בַּעְשָׁ֔א <WH1201> And it came to pass when Baasha וַיֶּחְדַּ֕ל <WH2308> [it] that he left off מִבְּנ֖וֹת <WH1129> building אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָמָ֑ה <WH7414> of Ramah וַיַּשְׁבֵּ֖ת <WH7673> cease אֶת־ <WH853> מְלַאכְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4399> and let his work ס

וְאָסָ֣א <WH609> Then Asa הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לָקַח֙ <WH3947> took אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> all Judah וַיִּשְׂא֞וּ <WH5375> and they carried away אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְנֵ֤י <WH68> the stones הָֽרָמָה֙ <WH7414> of Ramah וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֵצֶ֔יהָ <WH6086> and the timber אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בָּנָ֖ה <WH1129> was building בַּעְשָׁ֑א <WH1201> thereof wherewith Baasha וַיִּ֣בֶן <WH1129> and he built בָּהֶ֔ם אֶת־ <WH853> גֶּ֖בַע <WH1387> therewith Geba וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <WH4709> and Mizpah ס

וּבָעֵ֣ת <WH6256> And at that time הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> he בָּ֚א <WH935> came חֲנָ֣נִי <WH2607> Hanani הָרֹאֶ֔ה <WH7200> the seer אֶל־ <WH413> to אָסָ֖א <WH609> to Asa מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him בְּהִשָּׁ֨עֶנְךָ֜ <WH8172> unto him Because thou hast relied עַל־ <WH5921> on מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> on the king אֲרָם֙ <WH758> of Syria וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not נִשְׁעַ֙נְתָּ֙ <WH8172> and not relied עַל־ <WH5921> and יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that נִמְלַ֛ט <WH4422> escaped חֵ֥יל <WH2426> army מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> of Syria מִיָּדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> out of thine hand

הֲלֹ֧א <WH3808> were not הַכּוּשִׁ֣ים <WH3569> Were not the Ethiopians וְהַלּוּבִ֗ים <WH3864> and the Lubims הָי֨וּ <WH1961> become לְחַ֧יִל ׀ <WH2428> host לָרֹ֛ב <WH7230> a huge לְרֶ֥כֶב <WH7393> chariots וּלְפָרָשִׁ֖ים <WH6571> horseman לְהַרְבֵּ֣ה <WH7235> many מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> with very וּבְהִשָּֽׁעֶנְךָ֥ <WH8172> lean עַל־ <WH5921> on יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> on the LORD נְתָנָ֥ם <WH5414> he delivered בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> them into thine hand

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Indeed יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD עֵינָ֞יו <WH5869> For the eyes מְשֹׁטְט֤וֹת <WH7751> run to and fro בְּכָל־ <WH3605> throughout הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> throughout the whole earth לְ֠הִתְחַזֵּק <WH2388> to shew himself strong עִם־ <WH5973> whose לְבָבָ֥ם <WH3824> in the behalf of [them] whose heart שָׁלֵ֛ם <WH8003> [is] perfect אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about נִסְכַּ֣לְתָּ <WH5528> toward him Herein thou hast done foolishly עַל־ <WH5921> and זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise כִּ֣י <WH3588> Indeed מֵעַ֔תָּה <WH6258> therefore from henceforth יֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> thou shalt have עִמְּךָ֖ <WH5973> with מִלְחָמֽוֹת׃ <WH4421> wars

וַיִּכְעַ֨ס <WH3707> was wroth אָסָ֜א <WH609> Then Asa אֶל־ <WH413> with הָרֹאֶ֗ה <WH7200> with the seer וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH5414> and put בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמַּהְפֶּ֔כֶת <WH4115> him in a prison כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בְזַ֥עַף <WH2197> for [he was] in a rage עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with עַל־ <WH5921> and זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise וַיְרַצֵּ֥ץ <WH7533> oppressed אָסָ֛א <WH609> with him because of this [thing] And Asa מִן־ <WH4480> some הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> [some] of the people בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> the same time הַהִֽיא׃ <WH1931> the same

וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Now דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> And behold the acts אָסָ֔א <WH609> of Asa הָרִאשׁוֹנִ֖ים <WH7223> first וְהָאַחֲרוֹנִ֑ים <WH314> and last הִנָּ֤ם <WH2005> behold כְּתוּבִים֙ <WH3789> lo they [are] written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> in the book הַמְּלָכִ֔ים <WH4428> of the kings לִיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> and Israel

וַיֶּחֱלֶ֣א <WH2456> was diseased אָסָ֡א <WH609> And Asa בִּשְׁנַת֩ <WH8141> year שְׁלוֹשִׁ֨ים <WH7970> in the thirty וָתֵ֤שַׁע <WH8672> and ninth לְמַלְכוּתוֹ֙ <WH4438> of his reign בְּרַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> in his feet עַד־ <WH5704> against לְמַ֖עְלָה <WH4605> [was] exceeding חָלְי֑וֹ <WH2483> until his disease וְגַם־ <WH1571> even בְּחָלְיוֹ֙ <WH2483> [great] yet in his disease לֹא־ <WH3808> did not דָרַ֣שׁ <WH1875> he sought אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> not to the LORD כִּ֖י <WH3588> but בָּרֹפְאִֽים׃ <WH7495> but to the physicians

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH7901> slept אָסָ֖א <WH609> And Asa עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֑יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיָּ֕מָת <WH4191> and died בִּשְׁנַ֛ת <WH8141> year אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> and fortieth וְאַחַ֖ת <WH259> in the one לְמָלְכֽוֹ׃ <WH4427> of his reign

וַיִּקְבְּרֻ֣הוּ <WH6912> And they buried בְקִבְרֹתָ֗יו <WH6913> him in his own sepulchres אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which כָּֽרָה־ <WH3738> which he had made לוֹ֮ בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> for himself in the city דָּוִיד֒ <WH1732> of David וַיַּשְׁכִּיבֻ֗הוּ <WH7901> and laid בַּמִּשְׁכָּב֙ <WH4904> him in the bed אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which מִלֵּא֙ <WH4390> which was filled בְּשָׂמִ֣ים <WH1314> with sweet odours וּזְנִ֔ים <WH2177> and divers kinds מְרֻקָּחִ֖ים <WH4842> by the apothecaries' בְּמִרְקַ֣חַת <WH4842> prepared by the apothecaries' art מַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH4639> art וַיִּשְׂרְפוּ־ <WH8313> and they made ל֥וֹ שְׂרֵפָ֖ה <WH8316> burning גְּדוֹלָ֥ה <WH1419> great עַד־ <WH5704> against לִמְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> a very פ
